ValidationRule.description: Prevent the Contract Clean field from being updated multiple times.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISCHANGED(Contract_Clean__c), PRIORVALUE(Contract_Clean__c) = True, ($UserRole.Name <> "HRE Handbook Supervisor team 1"), ($UserRole.Name <> "HRE Handbook Supervisor team 2"), ($UserRole.Name <> "HRE Handbook Supervisor team 3"), ($UserRole.Name <> "HRE HR Services Supervisor team 1"), ($UserRole.Name <> "HRE HR Services Supervisor team 2"), ($UserRole.Name <> "System Administrator") )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You cannot uncheck the 'Contract Clean' field.
